assumption.Assumptions: Security and availability of the cloud (including the database, the service, the infrastructure, the platform, etc.) is the responsibility of the cloud service provider (CSP) / data center
assumption.Comments: As per Bosch guidelines, the cloud on-boarding team (BSI) is responsible for ensuring this and it must be informed of any security needs concerned with configuration of Cloud Infrastructure
assumption.assumption: Security and availability of the cloud (including the database, the service, the infrastructure, the platform, etc.) is the responsibility of the cloud service provider (CSP) / data center
assumption.assumption_comment: As per Bosch guidelines, the cloud on-boarding team (BSI) is responsible for ensuring this and it must be informed of any security needs concerned with configuration of Cloud Infrastructure

assumption.Assumptions: Azure Container Instances easily deploy containers using various methods, including Azure Portal, Azure CLI, ARM templates, and container orchestrators like Kubernetes.
assumption.Comments: Where data breaches and cyber attacks are becoming increasingly common, it is important to take all necessary measures to secure critical systems and prevent unauthorized access
assumption.assumption: Azure Container Instances easily deploy containers using various methods, including Azure Portal, Azure CLI, ARM templates, and container orchestrators like Kubernetes.
assumption.assumption_comment: Where data breaches and cyber attacks are becoming increasingly common, it is important to take all necessary measures to secure critical systems and prevent unauthorized access

assumption.Assumptions: Any data written to the local filesystem is temporary and will be lost when the container instance is stopped or restarted
assumption.Comments: This provides redundancy and ensures that ACI can continue to operate even in the event of an outage or failure in one availability zone or region
assumption.assumption: Any data written to the local filesystem is temporary and will be lost when the container instance is stopped or restarted
assumption.assumption_comment: This provides redundancy and ensures that ACI can continue to operate even in the event of an outage or failure in one availability zone or region

assumption.Assumptions: Container registry supports authentication and authorization mechanisms to control access to container images.
assumption.Comments: This highlights the importance of secure communication protocols and the need to guard against such threats in the design and implementation of technology systems
assumption.assumption: Container registry supports authentication and authorization mechanisms to control access to container images.
assumption.assumption_comment: This highlights the importance of secure communication protocols and the need to guard against such threats in the design and implementation of technology systems

assumption.Assumptions: ACR provides features for scanning container images for vulnerabilities and enforcing security policies.
assumption.Comments: Acknowledges the risk of data alteration or destruction, either intentionally or unintentionally, as well as the risk of malicious code injection. This highlights the need for robust security measures to protect against these types of threats and maintain the integrity and availability of sensitive information
assumption.assumption: ACR provides features for scanning container images for vulnerabilities and enforcing security policies.
assumption.assumption_comment: Acknowledges the risk of data alteration or destruction, either intentionally or unintentionally, as well as the risk of malicious code injection. This highlights the need for robust security measures to protect against these types of threats and maintain the integrity and availability of sensitive information

assumption.Assumptions: MySQL database software is regularly patched and updated to address known vulnerabilities and ensure that the latest security features are applied.
assumption.Comments: Regular Patching and Updates
assumption.assumption: MySQL database software is regularly patched and updated to address known vulnerabilities and ensure that the latest security features are applied.
assumption.assumption_comment: Regular Patching and Updates

assumption.Assumptions: Access controls, including user privileges and roles, are properly configured to restrict database access to authorized users based on the principle of least privilege.
assumption.Comments: Access Controls in Place
assumption.assumption: Access controls, including user privileges and roles, are properly configured to restrict database access to authorized users based on the principle of least privilege.
assumption.assumption_comment: Access Controls in Place

assumption.Assumptions: Data transmitted to and from the MySQL database is encrypted using secure communication protocols (e.g., SSL/TLS)
assumption.Comments: Encryption for Data in Transit
assumption.assumption: Data transmitted to and from the MySQL database is encrypted using secure communication protocols (e.g., SSL/TLS)
assumption.assumption_comment: Encryption for Data in Transit

assumption.Assumptions: Comprehensive logging and monitoring are implemented to track database activities, detect anomalies, and provide insights into potential security incidents
assumption.Comments: Logging and Monitoring Enabled
assumption.assumption: Comprehensive logging and monitoring are implemented to track database activities, detect anomalies, and provide insights into potential security incidents
assumption.assumption_comment: Logging and Monitoring Enabled

assumption.Assumptions: Secure backup and recovery processes are in place to ensure data availability and integrity
assumption.Comments: Secure Backup and Recovery Processes
assumption.assumption: Secure backup and recovery processes are in place to ensure data availability and integrity
assumption.assumption_comment: Secure Backup and Recovery Processes

assumption.Assumptions: MySQL is configured securely, with settings that adhere to best practices
assumption.Comments: Secure Configuration
assumption.assumption: MySQL is configured securely, with settings that adhere to best practices
assumption.assumption_comment: Secure Configuration

assumption.Assumptions: Proper access control mechanisms are in place, including strong authentication and authorization processes
assumption.Comments: Access Control and Authentication
assumption.assumption: Proper access control mechanisms are in place, including strong authentication and authorization processes
assumption.assumption_comment: Access Control and Authentication

assumption.Assumptions: The Oracle database is kept up to date with the latest security patches and updates
assumption.Comments: Regular Patching and Updates
assumption.assumption: The Oracle database is kept up to date with the latest security patches and updates
assumption.assumption_comment: Regular Patching and Updates

assumption.Assumptions: Both web application developers and the users should have some basic knowledge regarding security related to web application
assumption.Comments: Users and developers should have knowledge about functional safety
assumption.assumption: Both web application developers and the users should have some basic knowledge regarding security related to web application
assumption.assumption_comment: Users and developers should have knowledge about functional safety

assumption.Assumptions: Web application data is regularly backed up
assumption.Comments: Web application data should be backed up
assumption.assumption: Web application data is regularly backed up
assumption.assumption_comment: Web application data should be backed up

assumption.Assumptions: An attacker cannot break state-of-the-art cryptographic algorithms and protocols
assumption.Comments: Recommended cryptographic algorithms that are used can't be broken mathematically BUT implementations may be broken and appropriate side-channel resistance may be required
assumption.assumption: An attacker cannot break state-of-the-art cryptographic algorithms and protocols
assumption.assumption_comment: Recommended cryptographic algorithms that are used can't be broken mathematically BUT implementations may be broken and appropriate side-channel resistance may be required

assumption.Assumptions: Third-party dependencies are secured and trust worthy
assumption.Comments: If the static web application uses third-party libraries or frameworks, regularly scan for vulnerabilities in these dependencies.
assumption.assumption: Third-party dependencies are secured and trust worthy
assumption.assumption_comment: If the static web application uses third-party libraries or frameworks, regularly scan for vulnerabilities in these dependencies.

assumption.Assumptions: Static code analysis- are done to identify security vulnerabilities in the codebase
assumption.Comments: Static Code Analysis
assumption.assumption: Static code analysis- are done to identify security vulnerabilities in the codebase
assumption.assumption_comment: Static Code Analysis

assumption.Assumptions: Access controls shall restrict unauthorized access to certain pages or resources within the static web application
assumption.Comments: Ensures that users can only access the content and functionality intended for them
assumption.assumption: Access controls shall restrict unauthorized access to certain pages or resources within the static web application
assumption.assumption_comment: Ensures that users can only access the content and functionality intended for them

assumption.Assumptions: Both web application developers and the users should have some basic knowledge regarding security related to web application
assumption.Comments: Users and developers should have knowledge about security mechanisms
assumption.assumption: Both web application developers and the users should have some basic knowledge regarding security related to web application
assumption.assumption_comment: Users and developers should have knowledge about security mechanisms

assumption.Assumptions: Dependencies and third-party libraries are secure, up-to-date
assumption.Comments: Most of the third party software are secure and trustworthy
assumption.assumption: Dependencies and third-party libraries are secure, up-to-date
assumption.assumption_comment: Most of the third party software are secure and trustworthy

assumption.Assumptions: Web application data is regularly backed up
assumption.Comments: Web application data should be backed up
assumption.assumption: Web application data is regularly backed up
assumption.assumption_comment: Web application data should be backed up

assumption.Assumptions: An attacker cannot break state-of-the-art cryptographic algorithms and protocols
assumption.Comments: Recommended cryptographic algorithms that are used can't be broken mathematically but implementations may be broken and appropriate side-channel resistance may be required
assumption.assumption: An attacker cannot break state-of-the-art cryptographic algorithms and protocols
assumption.assumption_comment: Recommended cryptographic algorithms that are used can't be broken mathematically but implementations may be broken and appropriate side-channel resistance may be required

assumption.Assumptions: All communication between the client and server is secure and encrypted
assumption.Comments: End users are well trained on security concepts
assumption.assumption: All communication between the client and server is secure and encrypted
assumption.assumption_comment: End users are well trained on security concepts

assumption.Assumptions: Configurations of the webserver and database communicating internally to server components and external exposed API should follow secure procedures
assumption.Comments: Web server and database follow secure procedures
assumption.assumption: Configurations of the webserver and database communicating internally to server components and external exposed API should follow secure procedures
assumption.assumption_comment: Web server and database follow secure procedures

assumption.Assumptions: Sessions are managed securely using strong session tokens, encryption, and secure cookies
assumption.Comments: Weak session management practices can allow session hijacking leading to unauthorized access
assumption.assumption: Sessions are managed securely using strong session tokens, encryption, and secure cookies
assumption.assumption_comment: Weak session management practices can allow session hijacking leading to unauthorized access

assumption.Assumptions: Input data is validated, sanitized, and encoded correctly
assumption.Comments: Inadequate or flawed input validation can lead to various injection attacks, compromising application security and integrity
assumption.assumption: Input data is validated, sanitized, and encoded correctly
assumption.assumption_comment: Inadequate or flawed input validation can lead to various injection attacks, compromising application security and integrity

assumption.Assumptions: The authentication mechanism is secure and cannot be bypassed
assumption.Comments: Weak authentication methods can lead to unauthorized access like credential stuffing and privilege escalation
assumption.assumption: The authentication mechanism is secure and cannot be bypassed
assumption.assumption_comment: Weak authentication methods can lead to unauthorized access like credential stuffing and privilege escalation

assumption.Assumptions: The database is maintained securely
assumption.Comments: Poor configured databases, inadequate access controls, or vulnerabilities in the database system can lead to unauthorized access or data breaches
assumption.assumption: The database is maintained securely
assumption.assumption_comment: Poor configured databases, inadequate access controls, or vulnerabilities in the database system can lead to unauthorized access or data breaches

misuse.MUC Description: If the platform's APIs are used in ways that violate ethical, legal, or policy constraints, leading to negative consequences such as privacy breaches, bias, discrimination, or harm to individuals or society
misuse.Comment: It is important to take proactive measure such as proper training and monitoring, are necessary to prevent and mitigate the risks of misuse cases in Azure Cognitive Services
misuse.muc_description: If the platform's APIs are used in ways that violate ethical, legal, or policy constraints, leading to negative consequences such as privacy breaches, bias, discrimination, or harm to individuals or society
misuse.muc_comment: It is important to take proactive measure such as proper training and monitoring, are necessary to prevent and mitigate the risks of misuse cases in Azure Cognitive Services

misuse.MUC Description: Unauthorized access to Azure Container Instances can have serious consequences, including the loss of sensitive data, disruption of services, and installation of malware
misuse.Comment: To prevent unauthorized access to Azure Container Instances, it is important to implement strong access controls, regularly monitor access logs
misuse.muc_description: Unauthorized access to Azure Container Instances can have serious consequences, including the loss of sensitive data, disruption of services, and installation of malware
misuse.muc_comment: To prevent unauthorized access to Azure Container Instances, it is important to implement strong access controls, regularly monitor access logs

misuse.MUC Description: Authentication and authorization mechanisms have been successfully bypassed by an attacker, granting them unauthorized access to the backend services. This is the result of inadequate security protocols or weak passwords, both used to gain unauthorized access to the server
misuse.Comment: To protect security breach  stronger authentication protocols and passwords are essential
misuse.muc_description: Authentication and authorization mechanisms have been successfully bypassed by an attacker, granting them unauthorized access to the backend services. This is the result of inadequate security protocols or weak passwords, both used to gain unauthorized access to the server
misuse.muc_comment: To protect security breach  stronger authentication protocols and passwords are essential

misuse.MUC Description: Hackers can gain unauthorized access to sensitive data that can result in security risk
misuse.Comment: Security risk from unauthorized access to sensitive data+A3A2:D2A2:D3A2:DA2:D7
misuse.muc_description: Hackers can gain unauthorized access to sensitive data that can result in security risk
misuse.muc_comment: Security risk from unauthorized access to sensitive data+A3A2:D2A2:D3A2:DA2:D7

misuse.MUC Description: An attacker injects malicious SQL code into user inputs, exploiting vulnerabilities in the application to manipulate the database
misuse.muc_description: An attacker injects malicious SQL code into user inputs, exploiting vulnerabilities in the application to manipulate the database

misuse.MUC Description: Hackers gains unauthorized access to the MySQL database and attempts to escalate their privileges to perform administrative actions
misuse.muc_description: Hackers gains unauthorized access to the MySQL database and attempts to escalate their privileges to perform administrative actions

misuse.MUC Description: Attacker floods the MySQL database with a high volume of requests or queries, overwhelming its resources and causing a denial of service
misuse.muc_description: Attacker floods the MySQL database with a high volume of requests or queries, overwhelming its resources and causing a denial of service

misuse.MUC Description: Attacker installs a backdoor in the MySQL database, providing persistent unauthorized access for future exploitation
misuse.muc_description: Attacker installs a backdoor in the MySQL database, providing persistent unauthorized access for future exploitation

misuse.MUC Description: An attacker injects malicious scripts into applications interacting with the Oracle database, aiming to compromise users accessing the application and potentially stealing their credentials or session tokens.
misuse.muc_description: An attacker injects malicious scripts into applications interacting with the Oracle database, aiming to compromise users accessing the application and potentially stealing their credentials or session tokens.

misuse.MUC Description: An attacker exploits misconfigurations or insecurely stored configuration files in the Oracle database server, gaining valuable information that can be used to compromise the database or other connected systems.
misuse.muc_description: An attacker exploits misconfigurations or insecurely stored configuration files in the Oracle database server, gaining valuable information that can be used to compromise the database or other connected systems.

misuse.MUC Description: An attacker exploits a buffer overflow vulnerability in Oracle database software to execute arbitrary code within the database's memory space.
misuse.muc_description: An attacker exploits a buffer overflow vulnerability in Oracle database software to execute arbitrary code within the database's memory space.

misuse.MUC Description: An attacker introduces malicious code (e.g., malware, backdoors) into the Oracle database, compromising its integrity and allowing unauthorized remote access or control over the database.
misuse.muc_description: An attacker introduces malicious code (e.g., malware, backdoors) into the Oracle database, compromising its integrity and allowing unauthorized remote access or control over the database.

misuse.MUC Description: An attacker might exploit vulnerabilities or insecure configurations in the Oracle database to extract sensitive data (e.g., credit card numbers, personal information) and exfiltrate it to external servers or locations under their control.
misuse.muc_description: An attacker might exploit vulnerabilities or insecure configurations in the Oracle database to extract sensitive data (e.g., credit card numbers, personal information) and exfiltrate it to external servers or locations under their control.

damageScenario.Reasoning for the relevance of the DS fo: Data theft, sabotage, fraud, reputational damage, financial losses, legal repercussions, and erosion of employee and public trust.
damageScenario.Reasoning for the choice of the conseque: Insider threats pose a serious impact on organizations due to their potential for significant damage from individuals with access to internal systems and sensitive information.
damageScenario.consequence_DS: Data theft, sabotage, fraud, reputational damage, financial losses, legal repercussions, and erosion of employee and public trust.
damageScenario.consequence_reasoning: Insider threats pose a serious impact on organizations due to their potential for significant damage from individuals with access to internal systems and sensitive information.

damageScenario.Reasoning for the relevance of the DS fo: Exposure of sensitive information (e.g., customer data, intellectual property) can lead to legal penalties, and loss of customer trust.
damageScenario.Reasoning for the choice of the conseque: While the loss of customer trust is a serious concern, organizations can manage and mitigate its impact through effective crisis management, communication, and a demonstrated commitment to improving security measures and addressing customer concerns.
damageScenario.consequence_DS: Exposure of sensitive information (e.g., customer data, intellectual property) can lead to legal penalties, and loss of customer trust.
damageScenario.consequence_reasoning: While the loss of customer trust is a serious concern, organizations can manage and mitigate its impact through effective crisis management, communication, and a demonstrated commitment to improving security measures and addressing customer concerns.

damageScenario.Reasoning for the relevance of the DS fo: Data manipulation, theft, or destruction; unauthorized transactions; reputational damage; legal repercussions.

damageScenario.consequence_DS: Data manipulation, theft, or destruction; unauthorized transactions; reputational damage; legal repercussions.
damageScenario.consequence_reasoning: Data theft and manipulation have a serious impact due to the potential for severe financial losses, reputational damage, legal liabilities, and operational disruption.

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Cognitive Services accounts shall be enabled data encryption with a customer-managed key
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Cognitive Services accounts shall be enabled data encryption with a customer-managed key

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Cognitive Services accounts shall disable public network access
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Cognitive Services accounts shall disable public network access

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Cognitive Services accounts shall restrict network access
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Cognitive Services accounts shall restrict network access

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Cognitive Services accounts shall have local authentication methods disabled
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Cognitive Services accounts shall have local authentication methods disabled

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Ensure that your Azure Container Instances are deployed within a Virtual Network (VNet) and leverage Virtual Network Service Endpoints.
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Ensure that your Azure Container Instances are deployed within a Virtual Network (VNet) and leverage Virtual Network Service Endpoints.

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Leverage Azure Container Instances redundancy and high availability features to distribute your container instances across multiple regions or availability zones.
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Leverage Azure Container Instances redundancy and high availability features to distribute your container instances across multiple regions or availability zones.

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Implementing strong access controls and utilizing role-based permissions is essential to restrict access to Azure Container Registry resources.
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Implementing strong access controls and utilizing role-based permissions is essential to restrict access to Azure Container Registry resources.

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Integrate Azure Container Registry with Azure Active Directory for user authentication.
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Integrate Azure Container Registry with Azure Active Directory for user authentication.

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Ensure secure Wi-Fi connections and use protocols like WPA3 to protect against unauthorized access and eavesdropping
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Ensure secure Wi-Fi connections and use protocols like WPA3 to protect against unauthorized access and eavesdropping

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Enforce the principle of least privilege, use Azure AD authentication, and regularly review user permissions
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Enforce the principle of least privilege, use Azure AD authentication, and regularly review user permissions

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Privileged accounts must only be used for tasks where privileged permissions are required. The usage must be limited to the minimum of time needed to fulfill the task.
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Privileged accounts must only be used for tasks where privileged permissions are required. The usage must be limited to the minimum of time needed to fulfill the task.

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Implement access controls based on the principle of least privilege, granting users and applications the minimum level of access necessary to perform their tasks.
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Implement access controls based on the principle of least privilege, granting users and applications the minimum level of access necessary to perform their tasks.

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Enable auditing to track and log database activities, including modifications to critical data, and regularly review audit logs to detect unauthorized changes.
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Enable auditing to track and log database activities, including modifications to critical data, and regularly review audit logs to detect unauthorized changes.

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Implement network firewalls to filter and control traffic to the database, blocking malicious traffic and potential DoS attacks.
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Implement network firewalls to filter and control traffic to the database, blocking malicious traffic and potential DoS attacks.

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Strong data encryption, applying access controls and authentication and monitoring shall be implemented
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Strong data encryption, applying access controls and authentication and monitoring shall be implemented

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Validation of all user inputs on both the client and server sides shall prevent injection attacks
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Validation of all user inputs on both the client and server sides shall prevent injection attacks

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Web Application firewall shall detect and respond to patterns indicative of DoS attempts
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Web Application firewall shall detect and respond to patterns indicative of DoS attempts

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Strong data encryption, applying access controls and authentication, regularly auditing and monitoring user activity shall reduce unauthorized attacks
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Strong data encryption, applying access controls and authentication, regularly auditing and monitoring user activity shall reduce unauthorized attacks

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Checksums, hash functions, or digital signatures shall verify the integrity of data during transmission and storage
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Checksums, hash functions, or digital signatures shall verify the integrity of data during transmission and storage

SecurityNeeds.Security Need Description: Redundancy, server side tracking, management of user sessions, independent of client side cookies and regular performance testing shall be implemented
SecurityNeeds.security_description_threat: Redundancy, server side tracking, management of user sessions, independent of client side cookies and regular performance testing shall be implemented
